channel.title: Making a Server that I own
channel.description: I'm having a problem making a server that i own. for some reason i have jdk but it doesnt work. can someone give me a tutorial on how to be the owner of a server so not everyone can spawn items? and so not everyone is a mod or admin? i would appreciate a good tutorial with a source included that will tell me exactly how to do all that please!!! :)

item.title: Making a Server that I own
item.dc:creator: @RSMASTER RSMASTER
item.description:
@RSMASTER wrote:

whatcha mean by jdk doesnt work?

if you get an error saying something like “cannot find jkd” when compiling or when you try to run your server. find which jdk version you have by going to c:// program files> java, you should see your jdk version, at the end it should have a number for example, you might see something like this jdk1.1.6.0_17.

now go to your client and server files, right click on the run and compile bats and look for something that looks familiar to jdk1.1.6.0_17, then replace the end number (17) with the jdk version that you have.

also you can change player rights by going into your server files, characters, then editing a characters profile. inside you should see p.rights - 0 or something. changing the 0 will change there rights.

0 is normal player
1 is player mod
2 is admin
3 is super admin, game maker

might be slightly different but mess about with it

Read full topic
item.source: Making a Server that I own
